p: A fibre taper Michelson modal interferometer consisting of an adiabatic taper of diameter 80 μm located 30 mm from cleaved end of the fibre, as shown in Figure 23, was investigated as a bend sensor in [ 142]. The bending angle was determined by passive interrogation of the interferometer by generating two quadrature phase-shifted signals from two FBGs with appropriately selected resonant wavelengths ( Figure 23). Optical phase-to-bending sensitivity of 0.3 rad/degree and a bend angle resolution of 0.014 degree/√Hz were achieved.
